text: @GavinNewsom People aren't taking it seriously in California. Park basketball courts are packed with 20, 30, 40+ peep playing full court games, breathing hard, close contact. These courts act as a big time conduit of #COVID19 , why do they remain open? @Kevin_Faulconer @LondonBreed @MayorOfLA
